body.pretty:
⊢ (2[logb]3)∈(ℝ \ ℚ)
⊣ 3 ∈ Prime
⊣ 2 ∈ Prime
⊣ 3 ≠ 2
⊣ ((3 ∈ Prime ∧ 2 ∈ Prime ∧ 3 ≠ 2)→(2[logb]3)∈(ℝ \ ℚ))
